faqs.question: Is RERA registration required for all property types being sold by agents in this area
faqs.answer: While RERA registration is mandatory for all projects exceeding 500 square meters or eight apartments, individual resale plots or homes do not typically require RERA registration. However, any reputable Real Estate Agents in Palam Vihar Extension will verify that the original project developer, if applicable, adhered to RERA guidelines. We prioritize transactions that offer clear titles and regulatory compliance, minimizing risk for our buying clients throughout Gurugram.

faqs.answer: Our commission structures are competitive and entirely transparent, usually ranging between 1 percent and 2 percent of the final transaction value, depending on the complexity of the deal and the value of the property.
